list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an event causing great suffering, destruction, and distress, such as a serious accident, crime, or natural catastrophe.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một bi kịch đã giết chết 95 người

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a play dealing with tragic events and having an unhappy ending, especially one concerning the downfall of the main character.
